Experience ORIGIN+ Founder & CEO July 2009Â -Â PresentÂ (11 years 2 months) shanghai 本然创新æˆç«‹äºŽ2009年,是ä¸å›½äº§å"创新咨询æœåŠ¡çš"先行者。我们致力于帮助 ä¼ä¸šå'现和定义新产å"的机会,概念与ç–略。 我们的客户是æ¥è‡ªä¸åŒè€Œé¢†åŸŸçš" 领导ä¼ä¸šï¼Œè€³ç†Ÿèƒ½è¯¦çš"åå—包括科勒,索尼,三星,OPPO,é…æ—,è"想,广汽 丰田,广汽ä¼ 祺,长安汽车,åšå£«è¥¿é—¨å,æƒ 而浦,è‹æ³Šå°",方太,è€æ¿ï¼Œç¾Ž 的,长虹,奥克斯,阿克è‹è¯ºè´å°",罗莱家纺,迪å¡ä¾¬ï¼Œå¥¥çš"斯,3M,通力ç‰ã€' Established in 2009, ORIGIN+ is the pioneer of product innovation consulting firm in China. We are dedicated in helping business discover and define the opportunity, concept and strategy for new product. Our clients consist of leaders from various industries, including those well-known names : Kohler,Sony,Samsung, OPPO, Meizu,Lenovo,TOYOTA, GuangZhou Auto, ChangAn Auto, BSH, Whirlpool, Supor,Fotile,Robam,Midea,Changhong,Aux, AkzonNobel,LuoLai,Decathlon, Otis,3M,KONE etc. BP Director Of Product Development May 2008Â -Â May 2009Â (1 year 1 month) Shanghai, China

mailto:leo.liu@originplus.com https://www.linkedin.com/in/liu-fang-%E5%88%98%E6%96%B9-4556406? jobid=1234&lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_jobs_easyapply_pdfgenresume%3Ben3GGYUQRjiybvlHX3niPA%3D%3D&licu=urn%3Ali%3A control%3Ad_jobs_easyapply_pdfgenresume-v02_profile https://www.linkedin.com/in/liu-fang-%E5%88%98%E6%96%B9-4556406? jobid=1234&lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_jobs_easyapply_pdfgenresume%3Ben3GGYUQRjiybvlHX3niPA%3D%3D&licu=urn%3Ali%3A control%3Ad_jobs_easyapply_pdfgenresume-v02_profile https://www.linkedin.com/in/liu-fang-%E5%88%98%E6%96%B9-4556406? jobid=1234&lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_jobs_easyapply_pdfgenresume%3Ben3GGYUQRjiybvlHX3niPA%3D%3D&licu=urn%3Ali%3A control%3Ad_jobs_easyapply_pdfgenresume-v02_profile http://www.originplus.com ÂÂ head of new product development, to develop a biomass energy solution to help consumer in rural area in emerging country have a cleaner, safer and more affordable living in kitchen.

GE Healthcare 6 years Design Director May 2006Â -ÂJune 2008Â (2 years 2 months) Shanghai, China Establishing China studio of global design from scratch, covering the region of greater China, Indian, East Europe and Latin American, serving all modalities in a full spectrum : product definition, product design, UX/UI design and service design. Paying great efforts to place design in a more strategic role in the "ICFC( in China for China) strategy for GE Healthcare, making design the partner of product strategy and planning in the very early stage of NPD process. Introducing User-centric approach and design thinking to whole R&D and product organization. Design Manager July 2004Â -Â May 2006Â (1 year 11 months) Leading the design team for global marketing,GE Plastics, reporting to GM of global design. Using design as a tool to explore the future opportunity of the innovative application of plastic resin, which gave critical possibilities for marketing strategy and material R&D as well. Closely collaborating with industry leaders on the most forward looking areas such as renewable energy house, high-speed train, electric vehicle, mobile computing etc. Senior Design Consultant July 2002Â -ÂJuly 2004Â (2 years 1 month) Working as a senior design consultant for GE/FITCH, which was a joint venture of GE Plastic and Fitch worldwide at the time. Providing pretty hard-core design services such as DFMA to GE Plastics, and strategic design services such as PI ( product identity) to other clients in Greater China and SEA . Midea lead designer / design manager August 1997Â -Â March 2002Â (4 years 8 months)

ÂÂ As the pioneer of in-house industrial designer in China, providing product design service to Midea and other benefit-conflict free external clients. Beside using the very old school design techniques of hand sketching, hand rendering and hand made prototypes, we were the pioneers of adopting contemporary design techniques, such 2D rendering, 3D modeling and 3D printing back then. As the major driver, to help import user-centric approach into design process, including adoption of user research and UX/UI design .

Education Jiangnan University master of engineering of design,Â Industrial and Product DesignÂ ·Â (2004Â -Â 2007) Jiangnan University Bachelor of Arts - BA,Â Industrial and Product DesignÂ ·Â (1993Â -Â 1993)

workExperience.jobDescription: Establishing China studio of global design from scratch, covering the region of greater China, Indian, East Europe and Latin American, serving all modalities in a full spectrum : product definition, product design, UX/UI design and service design. Paying great efforts to place design in a more strategic role in the "ICFC( in China for China) strategy for GE Healthcare, making design the partner of product strategy and planning in the very early stage of NPD process. Introducing User-centric approach and design thinking to whole R&D and product organization.

classification.title: Managers and directors in the creative industries
classification.minorGroup: Managers and Proprietors in Other Services

workExperience.jobDescription: Leading the design team for global marketing,GE Plastics, reporting to GM of global design. Using design as a tool to explore the future opportunity of the innovative application of plastic resin, which gave critical possibilities for marketing strategy and material R&D as well. Closely collaborating with industry leaders on the most forward looking areas such as renewable energy house, high-speed train, electric vehicle, mobile computing etc.

Working as a senior design consultant for GE/FITCH, which was a joint venture of GE Plastic and Fitch worldwide at the time. Providing pretty hard-core design services such as DFMA to GE Plastics, and strategic design services such as PI ( product identity) to other clients in Greater China and SEA .
